entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
